modName: Glass Bow of the Stag Prince higher cap.
summary: This mod simply makes the bonus stats go higher than vanilla. The cap goes up to +350 health, mana and stamina.
descriptionHtml:
This mod simply makes the bonus stats go higher than vanilla. The cap goes up to +350 health, mana and stamina.
I thought, that having only +25 of every stat is useless, especially on high levels. So i decided to make this bow a bit more rewarding and maxed the cap.
Istall:
simply drag n drop in your Data folder
author: earltrucker
